af3d8268-96c9-49e3-b73d-bfb064d93c85.prefLabel: Absolute Gross Financed Emissions Related To AUM
af3d8268-96c9-49e3-b73d-bfb064d93c85.ifrs_definition: Absolute gross financed scope 1,2 and 3 greenhouse gas emissions related to assets under management (AUM). 'Financed emissions' refers to the portion of gross greenhouse gas emissions of an investee or counterparty attributed to the loans and investments made by an entity to the investee or counterparty. These emissions are part of scope 3 Category 15 (investments) as defined in the Greenhouse Gas Protocol Corporate Value Chain (scope 3) Accounting and Reporting Standard (2011).

eaf14fec-424e-4075-9e90-d576f0229de6.enriched_definition: A specific value indicating a fixed reduction or increase in a measured quantity, used to track progress towards a climate goal.

e32b6aaa-1771-41ac-9547-f52b54061508.enriched_definition: An entity that actively implements investment strategies to manage and reduce financed greenhouse gas emissions.

bf56a6f2-deca-4d07-b8a9-b8cec4092920.enriched_definition: Description of a company's operational framework and supply chain in relation to climate-related disclosures and strategy.

266d930c-4529-441f-a05c-5ca948d56c79.ifrs_definition: Information by carbon credit. An axis of a table defines the nature of the relationship between the line items (concepts) in the table, and the members (whose purpose is to further qualify facts associated with one of those line items). A carbon credit is an emissions unit that is issued by a carbon crediting programme and represents an emission reduction or removal of greenhouse gases. Carbon credits are uniquely serialised, issued, tracked and cancelled by means of an electronic registry.
path_label: Planned Use Of Carbon Credits Table
Planned Use Of Carbon Credits Abstract
266d930c-4529-441f-a05c-5ca948d56c79.enriched_definition: Axis categorizing information by carbon credits, which represent emission reductions or removals of greenhouse gases, issued and tracked through electronic registries.

72bc05b6-58ff-498b-9664-1323aeb8e2c7.ifrs_definition: This domain provides the (entity defined) list of carbon credits. It also represents the standard value for the 'Carbon credit' axis if no other member is used, and so stands for the aggregation of all carbon credits, or where not applicable. A carbon credit is an emissions unit that is issued by a carbon crediting programme and represents an emission reduction or removal of greenhouse gases. Carbon credits are uniquely serialised, issued, tracked and cancelled by means of an electronic registry.
path_label: Planned Use Of Carbon Credits Table
Planned Use Of Carbon Credits Abstract
72bc05b6-58ff-498b-9664-1323aeb8e2c7.enriched_definition: A conceptual group representing various carbon credits, each a uniquely serialized emission reduction unit issued by a carbon crediting program, tracked and cancelled through an electronic registry.

6ee922af-8596-458c-9d42-2ab044cbe7f9.enriched_definition: A carbon credit attribute specifying whether its underlying offset is achieved through reducing greenhouse gas emissions or removing existing carbon dioxide from the atmosphere.

Climate-related opportunities refers to the potential positive effects arising from climate change for an entity. Efforts to mitigate and adapt to climate change can produce climate-related opportunities for an entity.
c0dbe6b0-4468-43f0-9357-1dee1130e82f.enriched_definition: A climate-related opportunity refers to a positive effect or benefit that arises from efforts to mitigate or adapt to climate change, presenting a potential advantage for an entity.

43d2ae2b-6cc3-484a-979c-ffb786ed14b7.enriched_definition: Indicates whether climate-related performance metrics are included in remuneration policies, linking executive pay to climate targets and progress monitoring.

9c4b3b12-0fcc-44c8-9cb4-680653a6fb2d.enriched_definition: Represents the potential negative consequences of climate change on an organization, encompassing physical, regulatory, and market risks.

f9485e52-6d3a-48bc-8eda-ebecb739fda5.enriched_definition: Indicates whether climate-related scenario analysis encompasses various climate scenarios, affirming diversity with a true value.

3781fde3-23fd-402c-8b2d-a8ff0bd578eb.prefLabel: Climaterelated Scenario Used That Is Aligned With Latest International Agreement On Climate Change
3781fde3-23fd-402c-8b2d-a8ff0bd578eb.ifrs_definition: Indicates (true false) whether the entity used, among its scenarios, a climate-related scenario aligned with the latest international agreement on climate change.
path_label: How And When Climaterelated Scenario Analysis Was Carried Out Explanatory
3781fde3-23fd-402c-8b2d-a8ff0bd578eb.enriched_definition: A boolean indicator of whether an entity's climate-related scenario aligns with the latest international climate change agreement.

8200b434-37b8-4cf5-9b8e-7e93b409160e.prefLabel: Climaterelated Scenarios Used Are Associated With Climaterelated Transition Risks Or Climaterelated Physical Risks
8200b434-37b8-4cf5-9b8e-7e93b409160e.ifrs_definition: Indicates whether the climate-related scenarios used for the climate-related scenario analysis are associated with climate-related transition risks or climate-related physical risks.
path_label: How And When Climaterelated Scenario Analysis Was Carried Out Explanatory
8200b434-37b8-4cf5-9b8e-7e93b409160e.enriched_definition: Climate-related scenarios used to analyze transition or physical risks associated with climate change.

58fc88d6-b142-417d-9c3c-470b17bb4464.prefLabel: Climaterelated Target Absolute Or Intensity Domain
58fc88d6-b142-417d-9c3c-470b17bb4464.enriched_definition: Climaterelated Target Absolute Or Intensity Domain refers to a specific range of values on an axis that measures climate-related goals, either as absolute numbers or intensity levels, used to track and evaluate progress towards climate targets.

a4d25f37-555b-462c-83e9-e04644ff4805.prefLabel: Climaterelated Target And Methodology Validated By Third Party
a4d25f37-555b-462c-83e9-e04644ff4805.ifrs_definition: Indicates (true false) whether the climate-related target and the methodology for setting the target has been validated by a third party.
path_label: Approach To Setting And Reviewing Target And Monitoring Progress Explanatory
a4d25f37-555b-462c-83e9-e04644ff4805.enriched_definition: A boolean indicator confirming whether a third party has validated an entity's climate-related targets and associated methodology.

ad45dbbd-67b3-4574-a7cb-95045aeebd60.prefLabel: Climaterelated Target Is Absolute Target Or Intensity Target
ad45dbbd-67b3-4574-a7cb-95045aeebd60.ifrs_definition: Indicates whether a quantitative climate-related target is an absolute target or an intensity target.
ad45dbbd-67b3-4574-a7cb-95045aeebd60.enriched_definition: A climate-related target type that is either absolute, measuring total emissions, or intensity-based, measuring emissions relative to a unit of production or activity.

474f4f0d-72dd-4cce-8902-c79aac7b3afa.prefLabel: Climaterelated Target Was Derived Using Sectoral Decarbonisation Approach
474f4f0d-72dd-4cce-8902-c79aac7b3afa.ifrs_definition: Indicates (true false) whether the climate-related target was derived using a sectoral decarbonisation approach.
474f4f0d-72dd-4cce-8902-c79aac7b3afa.enriched_definition: A boolean indicator of whether a climate-related target was set using a sectoral decarbonisation approach, showing true if derived from this method and false otherwise.

00c1a904-a0a4-47e0-8605-9463153db818.ifrs_definition: This member stands for the consolidated accounting group (for example, for an entity applying IFRS Accounting Standards, this group would comprise the parent and its consolidated subsidiaries).
00c1a904-a0a4-47e0-8605-9463153db818.enriched_definition: A Consolidated Accounting Group Member refers to a group comprising a parent entity and its consolidated subsidiaries, as defined by accounting standards such as IFRS, for the purpose of reporting greenhouse gas emissions.

780cbfbf-1e0a-4fbc-ba7c-f7b487ff29f7.ifrs_definition: Information by constituent greenhouse gas. An axis of a table defines the nature of the relationship between the line items (concepts) in the table, and the members (whose purpose is to further qualify facts associated with one of those line items).
path_label: Disaggregation Of GHG Emissions By Constituent Greenhouse Gases Table
Disaggregation Of GHG Emissions By Constituent Greenhouse Gases Abstract
780cbfbf-1e0a-4fbc-ba7c-f7b487ff29f7.enriched_definition: Axis categorizing greenhouse gas emissions by specific constituent gases, such as carbon dioxide or methane, to provide detailed information on emissions composition.

6468e842-2f56-434c-93b1-428cde027182.ifrs_definition: This domain provides the list of constituent greenhouse gases. It also represents the standard value for the 'Constituent greenhouse gas' axis if no other member is used, and so stands for the aggregation of all constituent greenhouse gases, or where not applicable.
path_label: Disaggregation Of GHG Emissions By Constituent Greenhouse Gases Table
Disaggregation Of GHG Emissions By Constituent Greenhouse Gases Abstract
6468e842-2f56-434c-93b1-428cde027182.enriched_definition: Constituent Greenhouse Gas Domain refers to a group of greenhouse gases, serving as a standard value for aggregation and representation of all constituent greenhouse gases in emissions reporting.

3efd4db2-9b62-4c43-83ba-0e3c8334b478.ifrs_definition: Control approach per GHG Protocol. Includes financial or operational control criteria.
3efd4db2-9b62-4c43-83ba-0e3c8334b478.enriched_definition: A specific method of determining control over greenhouse gas emissions, as defined by the GHG Protocol, based on financial or operational criteria.

0c137467-bd73-4b35-9118-7777389d94b2.enriched_definition: Cross-industry climate-related metrics and targets, including abstract concepts and string data types, used to disclose climate information.

60c42014-6d26-411a-8fb1-a6e635149f5a.ifrs_definition: This member stands for the currently stated amount disclosed for a metric. It is also the default value for the Retrospective application and retrospective restatement [axis] if no other member is used.
60c42014-6d26-411a-8fb1-a6e635149f5a.enriched_definition: Represents the currently disclosed amount for a metric, serving as the default value for retrospective application and restatement when no other member is specified.

77c4aa62-4340-4326-b1f6-7910c5c38ae7.enriched_definition: Specific date marking the conclusion of a reporting period, used for climate disclosure and sustainability financial information.

4bfc8fc4-c0ee-4d53-af27-8663548427a8.ifrs_definition: Indicates (true false) whether a sustainability-related metric is derived by adjusting a metric taken from a source other than IFRS Sustainability Disclosure Standards.

Metrics Developed By Entity Line Items

4096babb-f0f9-4ce7-af36-140544084531.enriched_definition: Textual explanation of errors occurring in previous reporting periods, detailing their nature and impact on sustainability-related financial information.

abb8b4c1-4076-4329-baf6-056b8da7af61.enriched_definition: Disaggregation Of Financed GHG Emissions By Asset Class refers to the process of categorizing and reporting greenhouse gas emissions associated with an organization's financial investments, broken down by specific asset classes such as stocks, bonds, or real estate.

469e13f5-982f-4fe0-9d0b-9dfe58f4508c.ifrs_definition: Line items are the concepts grouped together in a table (because they may relate to several different facts within a report). These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with members defined in one or many axes of the table.

469e13f5-982f-4fe0-9d0b-9dfe58f4508c.enriched_definition: Disaggregation of financed GHG emissions by asset class line items refers to specific data points that break down greenhouse gas emissions associated with various asset classes, providing detailed disclosure of reportable information in a tabular format.

f7b1fb75-e486-42be-8632-79ff8883cbe2.ifrs_definition: Line items are the concepts grouped together in a table (because they may relate to several different facts within a report). 4ba9470b-4de9-4f9f-8d19-abb490355ca4.ifrs_definition: Line items are the concepts grouped together in a table (because they may relate to several different facts within a report). 5ec9219c-f16f-446b-b653-a3cef68eaf36.prefLabel: Amount And Percentage Of Assets Or Business Activities Aligned With Climaterelated Opportunities Explanatory

5ec9219c-f16f-446b-b653-a3cef68eaf36.enriched_definition: Amount and percentage of assets or business activities that support climate change mitigation or adaptation efforts, such as renewable energy or sustainable practices.

19362369-9ef0-4dfd-b8ad-7b1fd1da586b.prefLabel: Amount And Percentage Of Assets Or Business Activities Vulnerable To Climaterelated Transition Risks Explanatory

path_label: Financial Position Financial Performance And Cash Flows Abstract

path_label: Financial Position Financial Performance And Cash Flows Abstract

a6d6471b-b4ef-4b14-9bbc-f11fb5b0b80d.ifrs_definition: Line items are the concepts grouped together in a table (because they may relate to several different facts within a report). Financial Position Financial Performance And Cash Flows Abstract
a6d6471b-b4ef-4b14-9bbc-f11fb5b0b80d.enriched_definition: Specific line items in financial reports that outline anticipated monetary impacts of climate-related risks and opportunities, providing detailed disclosures on potential financial effects.

a0f25157-ef4e-4225-a881-7292b74b3722.ifrs_definition: Schedule disclosing the anticipated effects of sustainability-related risks and opportunities on the entity's financial position, financial performance and cash flows over the short, medium and long term, including information about how sustainability-related risks and opportunities are included in the entity's financial planning.
path_label: Anticipated Financial Effects Of Risks And Opportunities Abstract
Financial Position Financial Performance And Cash Flows Abstract
a0f25157-ef4e-4225-a881-7292b74b3722.enriched_definition: Table disclosing anticipated financial impacts of climate-related risks and opportunities on an entity's financial position, performance, and cash flows, detailing short, medium, and long-term effects and incorporation into financial planning.

daf6fad9-93b6-46e6-b86b-5d3d25abe238.prefLabel: Any Contractual Instruments That Inform Understanding Of Scope2 GHG Emissions Explanatory
daf6fad9-93b6-46e6-b86b-5d3d25abe238.ifrs_definition: The disclosure of any contractual instruments that is necessary to inform users' understanding of the entity's scope 2 greenhouse gas emissions.
daf6fad9-93b6-46e6-b86b-5d3d25abe238.enriched_definition: Contractual instruments that clarify scope 2 greenhouse gas emissions, such as agreements or provisions that impact emission calculations or reporting.

46976663-0a2d-4ccb-9555-6cc47b7c925d.prefLabel: Approach Used To Measure GHG Emissions Explanatory
46976663-0a2d-4ccb-9555-6cc47b7c925d.ifrs_definition: The disclosure of the approach the entity uses to measure its greenhouse gas emissions, including: (1) the measurement approach, inputs and assumptions the entity uses to measure its greenhouse gas emissions (including emission factors and the extent to which the Scope 3 emissions are measured using inputs from specific activities and the extent to which they are measured using inputs that are verified); (2) the reason why the entity has chosen the measurement approach, inputs and assumptions it uses to measure its greenhouse gas emissions; and (3) any changes the entity made to the measurement approach, inputs and assumptions during the reporting period and the reasons for those changes.
46976663-0a2d-4ccb-9555-6cc47b7c925d.enriched_definition: The method used to quantify an entity's greenhouse gas emissions, including measurement approach, inputs, assumptions, and reasoning behind the chosen methodology, as well as any changes made during the reporting period.

0ebaf152-0fe8-40ff-acda-f62175ee7b90.prefLabel: Assessment Of Resilience Of Strategy And Business Model In Relation To Identified Risks Explanatory
0ebaf152-0fe8-40ff-acda-f62175ee7b90.ifrs_definition: The disclosure of the quantitative or qualitative assessment of the resilience of the entity's strategy and business model in relation to its sustainability-related risks (including climate-related risks), including information about how the assessment was carried out and its time horizon. When providing quantitative information, an entity may disclose a single amount or a range.
0ebaf152-0fe8-40ff-acda-f62175ee7b90.enriched_definition: Assessment of an entity's strategy and business model resilience to identified sustainability-related risks, including climate-related risks, disclosed through quantitative or qualitative information, with details on assessment methodology and time horizon.

519ac842-af36-4c6a-ab3d-dddd375b3392.prefLabel: Circumstances That Led To Existence Of Prior Period Errors That Are Impracticable To Correct And Description Of How And From When Errors Have Been Corrected Explanatory
519ac842-af36-4c6a-ab3d-dddd375b3392.ifrs_definition: The disclosure of the circumstances that led to the existence of prior period errors that are impracticable to correct, and a description of how and from when the errors have been corrected.
path_label: General Requirements For Disclosure Of Sustainabilityrelated Financial Information Abstract
519ac842-af36-4c6a-ab3d-dddd375b3392.enriched_definition: Circumstances leading to prior period errors that cannot be corrected, and explanations of error corrections, including when corrections were implemented.

eba32e15-063b-485d-9682-2793d4ea74fc.enriched_definition: Climate-related risks or opportunities refer to potential positive or negative impacts of climate change on an organization's operations, revenue, or reputation, including physical, regulatory, or market-related factors.

1c265761-b5f9-421a-9c3e-4a80ec2fc777.prefLabel: Climaterelated Risks Or Opportunities Line Items
1c265761-b5f9-421a-9c3e-4a80ec2fc777.ifrs_definition: Line items are the concepts grouped together in a table (because they may relate to several different facts within a report). These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with members defined in one or many axes of the table.
1c265761-b5f9-421a-9c3e-4a80ec2fc777.enriched_definition: Specific data points in climate-related disclosures, represented as string values, that outline potential risks or opportunities in a structured table format, allowing for organized reporting of climate-associated information.

68cdff8b-b5ac-476a-8cad-ba27e0638d6c.ifrs_definition: Schedule disclosing information that enables users of general purpose financial reports to understand the climate-related risks and opportunities that could reasonably be expected to affect the entity's prospects.
68cdff8b-b5ac-476a-8cad-ba27e0638d6c.enriched_definition: A table disclosing climate-related risks and opportunities that could impact an entity's financial prospects, providing users with relevant information to understand potential climate-related effects.

a396a87a-cc46-4d05-9196-9d42160fc8b8.enriched_definition: Targets or goals set by an organization to reduce its climate impact, such as greenhouse gas emission reductions or renewable energy adoption.

38be353d-66a3-4890-95ea-2799b083fccb.ifrs_definition: Line items are the concepts grouped together in a table (because they may relate to several different facts within a report). These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with members defined in one or many axes of the table.
38be353d-66a3-4890-95ea-2799b083fccb.enriched_definition: Specific data points in climate-related disclosures, represented as string values, that categorize and report climate-related information in a structured table format.

4317853f-dc14-4cce-81a5-52f1acae98ac.ifrs_definition: Schedule disclosing information about the targets the entity has set to monitor progress towards achieving its strategic goals and the targets it is required to meet by regulation or legislation.
4317853f-dc14-4cce-81a5-52f1acae98ac.enriched_definition: A table outlining specific climate-related targets, including strategic goals and regulatory requirements, to track progress and compliance.

42f79cad-0fda-4b96-b691-a1fa6f6cd0e4.ifrs_definition: The disclosure of any climate-related transition plan the entity has, including information about key assumptions used in developing its transition plan, and dependencies on which the entity’s transition plan relies.
path_label: How Entity Responded To And Plans To Respond To Risks And Opportunities In Its Strategy And Decisionmaking Explanatory
Effects Of Climate Related Risks And Opportunities On Strategy And Decision Making Line Items
Effects Of Climate Related Risks And Opportunities On Strategy And Decision Making Abstract
42f79cad-0fda-4b96-b691-a1fa6f6cd0e4.enriched_definition: A climate-related transition plan is a disclosed strategy outlining an entity's approach to managing climate-related risks and opportunities, including key assumptions and dependencies that underpin its transition to a low-carbon economy.

0f1b8295-439d-4a92-818d-a65b1da8ef4c.ifrs_definition: The disclosure of where in the entity's business model and value chain sustainability-related risks and opportunities (including climate-related risks and opportunities) are concentrated (for example, geographical areas, facilities, and types of assets).

08148601-1a35-4e47-9423-3913bdf4c969.enriched_definition: Definition Of Time Horizons: Specific periods considered for climate-related risk assessments and strategic planning, such as short-term, medium-term, or long-term.

e3bc21a2-e608-46c3-a593-87d564b8327d.prefLabel: Definition Of Time Horizons Line Items
e3bc21a2-e608-46c3-a593-87d564b8327d.ifrs_definition: Line items are the concepts grouped together in a table (because they may relate to several different facts within a report). These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with members defined in one or many axes of the table.
e3bc21a2-e608-46c3-a593-87d564b8327d.enriched_definition: Specific concepts grouped in tables to disclose reportable climate-related information, relating to various facts and axes within a climate disclosure report.

3afffa88-1665-4448-bcd2-ecf2398e5b62.ifrs_definition: Schedule disclosing the explanation of how the entity defines short, medium and long term and how these definitions are linked to the planning horizons used by the entity for strategic decision-making.
3afffa88-1665-4448-bcd2-ecf2398e5b62.enriched_definition: A table outlining an entity's definitions of short, medium, and long-term time horizons and their connection to strategic planning and decision-making.

7dbc5adf-ab5c-4ad1-9b74-cc087834d4a7.ifrs_definition: The disclosure of the categories included within its measure of scope 3 emission and explanation of basis for measurement of emission information provided by entities in its value chain if included in its measure of scope 3 emissions.
7dbc5adf-ab5c-4ad1-9b74-cc087834d4a7.enriched_definition: Details of inclusion within Scope 3 GHG emissions, explaining categories and measurement basis for emissions from entities in the value chain.

727d7b52-1a37-40d5-a581-407e46f13cf3.enriched_definition: Summary of initial application of new or amended IFRS sustainability standards, outlining climate-related disclosures and effective dates for implementation.

ec8e2a10-65ac-4a46-9779-802cbc74fb04.prefLabel: Early Application Of New Or Amended IFRS Sustainability Standard Line Items
ec8e2a10-65ac-4a46-9779-802cbc74fb04.ifrs_definition: Line items are the concepts grouped together in a table (because they may relate to several different facts within a report). These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with members defined in one or many axes of the table.
path_label: Early Application Of New Or Amended IFRS Sustainability Standard Abstract
ec8e2a10-65ac-4a46-9779-802cbc74fb04.enriched_definition: Specific line items in financial reports that disclose early adoption of new or amended IFRS sustainability standards, providing detailed information on climate-related disclosures.

c7fe6fc4-c9af-410b-9d56-48c97fad2a1b.ifrs_definition: Schedule disclosing the early application of a new or amended IFRS Sustainability Disclosure Standard.
path_label: Early Application Of New Or Amended IFRS Sustainability Standard Abstract
c7fe6fc4-c9af-410b-9d56-48c97fad2a1b.enriched_definition: Table listing early adoption details of new or revised IFRS Sustainability Disclosure Standards, outlining effective dates and transition information for climate-related disclosures.

60a9f63c-4311-4352-ad27-010591537009.prefLabel: Effects Of Significant Events And Changes In Circumstances Relevant To GHG Emissions That Occur Between Reporting Dates In Value Chain And General Purpose Financial Reports Explanatory
60a9f63c-4311-4352-ad27-010591537009.ifrs_definition: The disclosure of the effects of significant events and changes in circumstances (relevant to its greenhouse gas emissions) that occur between the reporting dates of the entities in its value chain and the date of the entity's general purpose financial reports.
60a9f63c-4311-4352-ad27-010591537009.enriched_definition: Disclosure of significant events and changes in circumstances affecting greenhouse gas emissions that occur between reporting dates in the value chain and general purpose financial reports.

0a77364f-41a3-465b-9c33-9264f3018051.prefLabel: Approach To Setting And Reviewing Target And Monitoring Progress Explanatory
0a77364f-41a3-465b-9c33-9264f3018051.ifrs_definition: The disclosure of how the entity's approach to setting and reviewing the target, and how it monitors progress against the target.
0a77364f-41a3-465b-9c33-9264f3018051.enriched_definition: Entity's methodology for establishing, assessing, and revising climate-related targets, including progress tracking and evaluation procedures.

12090af5-7042-4961-b900-8fab514cd160.ifrs_definition: The disclosure of the entity's assessment of its climate resilience as at the reporting date. Climate resilience is the capacity of an entity to adjust to climate-related changes, developments or uncertainties. Climate resilience involves the capacity to manage climate-related risks and benefit from climate-related opportunities, including the ability to respond and adapt to climate-relate transition risks and climate-related physical risks. An entity's climate resilience includes both its strategic resilience and its operational resilience to climate-related changes, developments or uncertainties.
12090af5-7042-4961-b900-8fab514cd160.enriched_definition: The entity's evaluation of its ability to adapt to climate-related changes, managing risks and leveraging opportunities, including strategic and operational resilience to transition and physical risks.

e2b22a1f-ce99-4ee6-96f6-744b87ee76d4.prefLabel: Extent To Which And How Processes For Identifying Assessing Prioritising And Monitoring Risks And Opportunities Are Integrated Into Or Inform Overall Risk Management Process Explanatory
e2b22a1f-ce99-4ee6-96f6-744b87ee76d4.ifrs_definition: The disclosure of the extent to which and how the processes for identifying, assessing, prioritising and monitoring sustainability-related risks and opportunities (including climate-related risks and opportunities) are integrated into or inform the entity's overall risk management process.
path_label: Risk Management Of Climaterelated Risks And Opportunities Line Items
Risk Management Of Climaterelated Risks And Opportunities Abstract
e2b22a1f-ce99-4ee6-96f6-744b87ee76d4.enriched_definition: Extent to which climate-related risks and opportunities are integrated into overall risk management, including identification, assessment, prioritization, and monitoring processes.

9ef31f14-f1ab-4da4-9020-82bbdcd71845.ifrs_definition: The disclosure of the fact that the exemption has been taken that permits entities, in limited circumstances, to omit information about sustainability-related opportunity if the information is commercially sensitive.
path_label: General Requirements For Disclosure Of Sustainabilityrelated Financial Information Abstract
9ef31f14-f1ab-4da4-9020-82bbdcd71845.enriched_definition: Disclosure of exemption taken to omit commercially sensitive information about sustainability-related opportunities.

General Requirements For Disclosure Of Sustainabilityrelated Financial Information Abstract
c5619183-b1a2-4ec0-9605-2a5a72c184b4.enriched_definition: Disclosure that revising a prior period's comparative amount is impracticable, typically due to lack of data or significant changes.

446a51f8-b732-417e-a483-e6a75eb8bb80.ifrs_definition: The disclosure of the fact that the transition relief has been taken permitting disclosure on only climate-related risks and opportunities (in accordance with IFRS S2) and consequently applying the requirements in IFRS S1 only insofar as they relate to the disclosure of climate-related financial information.
446a51f8-b732-417e-a483-e6a75eb8bb80.enriched_definition: Disclosure of taking transition relief to only report climate-related risks and opportunities, applying IFRS S1 requirements for climate-related financial information.

0f3cf4d2-73c4-468d-98fd-b38b0074b12d.ifrs_definition: Line items are the concepts grouped together in a table (because they may relate to several different facts within a report). 0f3cf4d2-73c4-468d-98fd-b38b0074b12d.enriched_definition: Financed emissions line items categorized by industry and asset class, providing reportable data for commercial banks' environmental impact.

2e702889-3503-481d-b4e9-b7443836a5b5.prefLabel: Financed Emissions By Industry And Asset Class Table
2e702889-3503-481d-b4e9-b7443836a5b5.ifrs_definition: Schedule disclosing financed emissions disaggregated by industry and by asset class.
path_label: Financed Emissions By Industry And Asset Class Abstract
2e702889-3503-481d-b4e9-b7443836a5b5.enriched_definition: Table detailing financed emissions categorized by industry and asset class, providing a schedule of disclosures for commercial banks.

87ffca75-8e4d-467c-99fb-eac9304fdb86.prefLabel: Governance Processes Controls And Procedures Used To Monitor And Manage Climaterelated Risks And Opportunities Abstract
87ffca75-8e4d-467c-99fb-eac9304fdb86.enriched_definition: Governance processes and controls used to monitor and manage climate-related risks and opportunities, enabling informed decision-making and strategic oversight.

7ae6b7c3-8a7f-4660-a350-a59576bbe06a.prefLabel: Governance Processes Controls And Procedures Used To Monitor And Manage Climaterelated Risks And Opportunities Line Items
7ae6b7c3-8a7f-4660-a350-a59576bbe06a.ifrs_definition: Line items are the concepts grouped together in a table (because they may relate to several different facts within a report). These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with members defined in one or many axes of the table.

7ae6b7c3-8a7f-4660-a350-a59576bbe06a.enriched_definition: Specific concepts grouped in tables to disclose climate-related risk and opportunity information, organized by relevant report axes.

3c02e251-9cf2-471d-8972-925dc0617944.prefLabel: Governance Processes Controls And Procedures Used To Monitor And Manage Climaterelated Risks And Opportunities Table
3c02e251-9cf2-471d-8972-925dc0617944.ifrs_definition: Schedule disclosing information that enables users of general purpose financial reports to understand the governance processes, controls and procedures used to monitor and manage climate-related risks and opportunities.

3c02e251-9cf2-471d-8972-925dc0617944.enriched_definition: Table outlining governance processes, controls, and procedures for monitoring and managing climate-related risks and opportunities, enabling financial report users to understand climate governance practices.

444f79c3-a47e-4824-871b-b57718b84ad5.enriched_definition: Governance processes and controls refer to the formal procedures and oversight mechanisms used by organizations to identify, assess, and manage climate-related risks and opportunities.

83e5e00a-c439-404c-ba0d-b31fdf91cf59.prefLabel: Governance Processes Controls And Procedures Used To Monitor Manage And Oversee Risks And Opportunities Line Items
83e5e00a-c439-404c-ba0d-b31fdf91cf59.ifrs_definition: Line items are the concepts grouped together in a table (because they may relate to several different facts within a report). These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with members defined in one or many axes of the table.
path_label: Governance Processes Controls And Procedures Used To Monitor Manage And Oversee Risks And Opportunities Abstract
83e5e00a-c439-404c-ba0d-b31fdf91cf59.enriched_definition: Specific concepts within climate-related disclosures, presented as line items in a table, that relate to governance processes, controls, and procedures for managing risks and opportunities.

13329002-47fc-4315-9d6b-0b03c06b68af.prefLabel: Governance Processes Controls And Procedures Used To Monitor Manage And Oversee Risks And Opportunities Table
13329002-47fc-4315-9d6b-0b03c06b68af.ifrs_definition: Schedule disclosing information that enables users of general purpose financial reports to understand the governance processes, controls and procedures used to monitor, manage and oversee sustainability-related risks and opportunities.
path_label: Governance Processes Controls And Procedures Used To Monitor Manage And Oversee Risks And Opportunities Abstract
13329002-47fc-4315-9d6b-0b03c06b68af.enriched_definition: Table detailing governance processes, controls, and procedures for monitoring and managing sustainability-related risks and opportunities.

6159825b-1503-47b9-9ce1-0497b406c0df.ifrs_definition: The disclosure of: (a) which greenhouse gases and (b) emission scopes are covered by entity's greenhouse gas emissions targets; (c) whether a target is a gross greenhouse gas emissions target or net greenhouse gas emissions target (and, if a net target, the associated gross greenhouse gas emissions target); and (d) whether the target was derived using a sectoral decarbonisation approach.
6159825b-1503-47b9-9ce1-0497b406c0df.enriched_definition: Details about an entity's greenhouse gas emission targets, including covered gases, emission scopes, target type, and calculation approach.

b865cc70-e401-4da0-bb73-3cefb892a3af.prefLabel: How And How Often Responsible Bodys Or Individuals Is Informed About Risks And Opportunities Explanatory
b865cc70-e401-4da0-bb73-3cefb892a3af.ifrs_definition: The disclosure of how and how often the responsible body(s) or individual(s) is informed about sustainability-related risks and opportunities (including climate-related risks and opportunities). [Refer: Identity of governance body(s) or individual(s) responsible for oversight of risks and opportunities [text block]].
path_label: Governance Processes Controls And Procedures Used To Monitor And Manage Climaterelated Risks And Opportunities Line Items
Governance Processes Controls And Procedures Used To Monitor And Manage Climaterelated Risks And Opportunities Abstract
b865cc70-e401-4da0-bb73-3cefb892a3af.enriched_definition: Disclosure of the frequency and method by which governing bodies or individuals are informed about climate-related risks and opportunities, outlining the process of risk oversight and management.

28dcb392-59e2-4acb-8237-9d46e14add27.prefLabel: How And When Climaterelated Scenario Analysis Was Carried Out Explanatory
28dcb392-59e2-4acb-8237-9d46e14add27.ifrs_definition: The disclosure of how and when the climate-related scenario analysis was carried out.
28dcb392-59e2-4acb-8237-9d46e14add27.enriched_definition: Description of the methodology and timing used to conduct climate-related scenario analysis, including key steps and milestones.

0e49de56-3364-43b9-87f5-41fa004ad627.prefLabel: How Bodys Or Individuals Oversees Setting Of Targets Related To Risks And Opportunities And Monitors Progress Towards Those Targets Explanatory
0e49de56-3364-43b9-87f5-41fa004ad627.ifrs_definition: The disclosure of how the responsible body(s) or individual(s) oversees the setting of targets related to sustainability-related risks and opportunities (including climate-related risks and opportunities), and monitors progress towards those targets, including whether and how related performance metrics are included in remuneration policies. [Refer: Identity of governance body(s) or individual(s) responsible for oversight of risks and opportunities [text block]].
path_label: Governance Processes Controls And Procedures Used To Monitor And Manage Climaterelated Risks And Opportunities Line Items
Governance Processes Controls And Procedures Used To Monitor And Manage Climaterelated Risks And Opportunities Abstract
0e49de56-3364-43b9-87f5-41fa004ad627.enriched_definition: The process by which designated bodies or individuals oversee setting and monitoring of sustainability-related risk and opportunity targets, including integration of performance metrics into remuneration policies.

b516e7ca-1a04-4a93-ae8a-83d162b7d2d5.prefLabel: How Climaterelated Target Informed By Latest International Agreement On Climate Change And Jurisdictional Commitments Arising From It Explanatory
b516e7ca-1a04-4a93-ae8a-83d162b7d2d5.ifrs_definition: The disclosure of how the latest international agreement on climate change, including jurisdictional commitments that arise from that agreement, has informed the target.
b516e7ca-1a04-4a93-ae8a-83d162b7d2d5.enriched_definition: Disclosure of how international climate agreements and jurisdictional commitments inform climate-related targets.

bacfd4b9-c410-4f1b-853f-585cbd7d0655.prefLabel: How Definition Of Time Horizons Is Linked To Planning Horizons Used For Strategic Decisionmaking Explanatory
bacfd4b9-c410-4f1b-853f-585cbd7d0655.ifrs_definition: The disclosure of how the definition of time horizon(s) is linked to the planning horizons used by the entity for strategic decision-making.
path_label: Definition Of Time Horizons Line Items
bacfd4b9-c410-4f1b-853f-585cbd7d0655.enriched_definition: The connection between defined time horizons and planning horizons used for strategic decision-making, specifically how they inform and influence each other in the context of climate-related disclosures.

63f6a067-12ff-4064-b163-b1727c8789f5.ifrs_definition: The explanation of how the entity defines time horizon.
path_label: Definition Of Time Horizons Line Items
63f6a067-12ff-4064-b163-b1727c8789f5.enriched_definition: A specific explanation of how an organization defines and interprets time horizon in the context of climate-related disclosures, outlining the duration or timeframe considered for assessing climate-related risks and opportunities.

9cd4191b-a691-4907-a8bf-85b6ab83ffb0.prefLabel: How Financial Performance And Cash Flows Expected To Change Over Short Medium And Long Term Given Strategy To Manage Risks And Opportunities Explanatory
9cd4191b-a691-4907-a8bf-85b6ab83ffb0.ifrs_definition: The disclosure of how the entity expects its financial performance and cash flows to change over the short, medium and long term, given its strategy to manage sustainability-related risks and opportunities (including climate-related risks and opportunities).
path_label: Anticipated Financial Effects Of Climaterelated Risks And Opportunities Line Items
Anticipated Financial Effects Of Climaterelated Risks And Opportunities Abstract
Financial Position Financial Performance And Cash Flows Abstract
9cd4191b-a691-4907-a8bf-85b6ab83ffb0.enriched_definition: Expected changes in financial performance and cash flows over short, medium, and long terms due to climate-related risks and opportunities management strategy.

a355f1d2-a7a9-4f62-9683-5007876b18f8.prefLabel: How Financial Position Expected To Change Over Short Medium And Long Term Given Strategy To Manage Risks And Opportunities Explanatory
a355f1d2-a7a9-4f62-9683-5007876b18f8.ifrs_definition: The disclosure of how the entity expects its financial position to change over the short, medium and long term given its strategy to manage sustainability-related risks and opportunities (including climate-related risks and opportunities), taking into consideration its investment and disposal plans, including the plans the entity is not contractually committed to; and its planned sources of funding to implement its strategy.
path_label: Anticipated Financial Effects Of Climaterelated Risks And Opportunities Line Items
Anticipated Financial Effects Of Climaterelated Risks And Opportunities Abstract
Financial Position Financial Performance And Cash Flows Abstract
a355f1d2-a7a9-4f62-9683-5007876b18f8.enriched_definition: Entity's expected change in financial position over short, medium, and long term, driven by its strategy to manage climate-related risks and opportunities, including investment, disposal, and funding plans.

9f68a6c8-9a16-42ed-8d34-b38b6587b0f6.prefLabel: How Entity Responded To And Plans To Respond To Risks And Opportunities In Its Strategy And Decisionmaking Explanatory
9f68a6c8-9a16-42ed-8d34-b38b6587b0f6.ifrs_definition: The disclosure of how the entity has responded to, and plans to respond to, sustainability-related risks and opportunities (including climate-related risks and opportunities) in its strategy and decision-making.
path_label: Effects Of Climate Related Risks And Opportunities On Strategy And Decision Making Line Items
Effects Of Climate Related Risks And Opportunities On Strategy And Decision Making Abstract
9f68a6c8-9a16-42ed-8d34-b38b6587b0f6.enriched_definition: Entity's strategy and decision-making response to climate-related risks and opportunities, including past actions and future plans to address sustainability-related challenges.

296bf14c-b4d6-4fcd-bce8-85bf8708638c.prefLabel: How Scope3 GHG Emissions Are Managed If Impracticable To Estimate Explanatory
296bf14c-b4d6-4fcd-bce8-85bf8708638c.ifrs_definition: The disclosure of how entity is managing its Scope 3 GHG emissions if the entity determines it is impracticable to estimate.
296bf14c-b4d6-4fcd-bce8-85bf8708638c.enriched_definition: Description of methods used to manage Scope 3 greenhouse gas emissions when estimation is impractical, outlining the entity's approach to handling these emissions.

9dad0794-faa5-495d-afce-6aa5b9a78bc3.prefLabel: How Entity Is Resourcing And Plans To Resource Activities Disclosed In Relation To Response To Climaterelated Risks And Opportunities In Strategy And Decisionmaking Explanatory
9dad0794-faa5-495d-afce-6aa5b9a78bc3.ifrs_definition: The disclosure of how the entity is resourcing, and plans to resource, the activities disclosed in relation to how the entity has responded to, or anticipates having to respond to, climate-related risks and opportunities in its strategy and decision-making.
path_label: Effects Of Climate Related Risks And Opportunities On Strategy And Decision Making Line Items
Effects Of Climate Related Risks And Opportunities On Strategy And Decision Making Abstract
9dad0794-faa5-495d-afce-6aa5b9a78bc3.enriched_definition: Entity's allocation of resources and future plans to address climate-related risks and opportunities in its strategic decision-making process.

81d04ea6-89f7-459f-92d9-9910fbaa7347.prefLabel: Description Of How Metric Is Defined Explanatory
81d04ea6-89f7-459f-92d9-9910fbaa7347.ifrs_definition: The disclosure of how the sustainability-related metric is defined, including whether it is derived by adjusting a metric taken from a source other than IFRS Sustainability Disclosure Standards and, if so, which source and how the metric disclosed by the entity differs from the metric specified in that source.
path_label: Metrics Developed By Entity Line Items
81d04ea6-89f7-459f-92d9-9910fbaa7347.enriched_definition: Explanation of how a sustainability metric is defined, including any adjustments made to a non-IFRS source metric and the differences between the entity's metric and the original source metric.

5afff541-fd46-47a6-8f62-1d76c750e2ba.prefLabel: How Responsibilities For Risks And Opportunities Are Reflected In Terms Of Reference Mandates Role Descriptions And Other Related Policies Applicable To Responsible Bodys Or Individuals Explanatory
5afff541-fd46-47a6-8f62-1d76c750e2ba.ifrs_definition: The disclosure of how the responsibilities for sustainability-related risks and opportunities (including climate-related risks and opportunities) are reflected in the terms of reference, mandates, role descriptions and other related policies applicable to the responsible body(s) or individual(s). [Refer: Identity of governance body(s) or individual(s) responsible for oversight of risks and opportunities [text block]].
path_label: Governance Processes Controls And Procedures Used To Monitor And Manage Climaterelated Risks And Opportunities Line Items
Governance Processes Controls And Procedures Used To Monitor And Manage Climaterelated Risks And Opportunities Abstract
5afff541-fd46-47a6-8f62-1d76c750e2ba.enriched_definition: How an organization's governance body or individuals address climate-related risks and opportunities through specific terms of reference, mandates, role descriptions, and policies.

aeb4da21-cef2-4d89-bd3c-343ac4617823.prefLabel: How Responsible Bodys Or Individuals Determines Appropriate Skills And Competencies Are Available Or Will Be Developed To Oversee Strategies To Respond To Risks And Opportunities Explanatory
aeb4da21-cef2-4d89-bd3c-343ac4617823.ifrs_definition: The disclosure of how the responsible body(s) or individual(s) determines whether appropriate skills and competencies are available or will be developed to oversee strategies designed to respond to sustainability-related risks and opportunities (including climate-related risks and opportunities). [Refer: Identity of governance body(s) or individual(s) responsible for oversight of risks and opportunities [text block]].
path_label: Governance Processes Controls And Procedures Used To Monitor And Manage Climaterelated Risks And Opportunities Line Items
Governance Processes Controls And Procedures Used To Monitor And Manage Climaterelated Risks And Opportunities Abstract
aeb4da21-cef2-4d89-bd3c-343ac4617823.enriched_definition: The process by which responsible entities ensure they have the necessary skills and competencies to oversee climate-related risk and opportunity strategies, including how they determine availability or plan for development of these skills.

aabe2bb2-6271-4dc9-963b-c3e68d1d2126.prefLabel: How Responsible Bodys Or Individuals Takes Into Account Risks And Opportunities When Overseeing Strategy Decisions On Major Transactions And Risk Management Processes And Related Policies Explanatory
aabe2bb2-6271-4dc9-963b-c3e68d1d2126.ifrs_definition: The disclosure of how the responsible body(s) or individual(s) takes into account sustainability-related risks and opportunities (including climate-related risks and opportunities) when overseeing the entity's strategy, its decisions on major transactions and its risk management processes and related policies, including whether the body(s) or individual(s) has considered trade-offs associated with those risks and opportunities. [Refer: Identity of governance body(s) or individual(s) responsible for oversight of risks and opportunities [text block]].
path_label: Governance Processes Controls And Procedures Used To Monitor And Manage Climaterelated Risks And Opportunities Line Items
Governance Processes Controls And Procedures Used To Monitor And Manage Climaterelated Risks And Opportunities Abstract
aabe2bb2-6271-4dc9-963b-c3e68d1d2126.enriched_definition: The process by which responsible bodies or individuals consider sustainability and climate-related risks and opportunities when making strategic decisions, managing major transactions, and overseeing risk management processes and policies, including trade-off considerations.

30b811aa-b800-49aa-a073-181d0ecaff5d.prefLabel: How Risks And Opportunities Have Affected Financial Position Financial Performance And Cash Flows For Reporting Period Explanatory
30b811aa-b800-49aa-a073-181d0ecaff5d.ifrs_definition: The disclosure of how sustainability-related risks and opportunities (including climate-related risks and opportunities) have affected entity's financial position, financial performance and cash flows for the reporting period.
path_label: Current Financial Effects Of Climaterelated Risks And Opportunities Line Items
Current Financial Effects Of Climaterelated Risks And Opportunities Abstract
Financial Position Financial Performance And Cash Flows Abstract
30b811aa-b800-49aa-a073-181d0ecaff5d.enriched_definition: Disclosure of climate-related risks and opportunities impacting financial position, performance, and cash flows during the reporting period, including effects on sustainability.

3458108a-4ee5-4e4d-a50b-4b688a01a075.prefLabel: Identity Of Governance Bodys Or Individuals Responsible For Oversight Of Risks And Opportunities Explanatory
3458108a-4ee5-4e4d-a50b-4b688a01a075.ifrs_definition: The disclosure of identity of the governance body(s) (which can include a board, committee or equivalent body charged with governance) or individual(s) responsible for oversight of sustainability-related risks and opportunities (including climate-related risks and opportunities).
path_label: Governance Processes Controls And Procedures Used To Monitor And Manage Climaterelated Risks And Opportunities Line Items
Governance Processes Controls And Procedures Used To Monitor And Manage Climaterelated Risks And Opportunities Abstract
3458108a-4ee5-4e4d-a50b-4b688a01a075.enriched_definition: The identity of governance bodies or individuals overseeing sustainability and climate-related risks and opportunities, including boards, committees, or equivalent entities responsible for monitoring and managing these risks.

993a77cf-2d7c-4cf1-816a-e3b08a0a653b.prefLabel: Industrys Applied In Preparing Sustainabilityrelated Financial Disclosures Explanatory
993a77cf-2d7c-4cf1-816a-e3b08a0a653b.ifrs_definition: The disclosure of the industry(s) specified in the IFRS Sustainability Disclosure Standards, the SASB Standards or other sources of guidance relating to a particular industry(s) that the entity has applied in preparing its sustainability-related financial disclosures, including in identifying applicable metrics.
path_label: General Requirements For Disclosure Of Sustainabilityrelated Financial Information Abstract
993a77cf-2d7c-4cf1-816a-e3b08a0a653b.enriched_definition: Industry(s) applied in preparing sustainability-related financial disclosures, as specified in IFRS or SASB standards, used to identify applicable metrics and guide disclosure.

e2fe9aca-bab8-4453-a34b-49fb705eb32f.prefLabel: Information About Judgements Apart From Those Involving Estimations Of Amounts Explanatory
e2fe9aca-bab8-4453-a34b-49fb705eb32f.ifrs_definition: The disclosure of information to enable users of general purpose financial reports to understand the judgements, apart from those involving estimations of amounts, that the entity has made in the process of preparing its sustainability-related financial disclosures and that have the most significant effect on the information included in those disclosures.
path_label: General Requirements For Disclosure Of Sustainabilityrelated Financial Information Abstract
e2fe9aca-bab8-4453-a34b-49fb705eb32f.enriched_definition: Judgements made by an entity, excluding amount estimations, that significantly impact sustainability-related financial disclosures, enabling report users to understand the decision-making process behind the disclosures.

a453d25a-2570-44be-b24e-ca55a7605724.prefLabel: Information About Significant Differences Between Data And Assumptions Used Preparing Sustainabilityrelated Financial Disclosures And Related Financial Statements Explanatory
a453d25a-2570-44be-b24e-ca55a7605724.ifrs_definition: The disclosure of information about significant differences between the data and assumptions used preparing the entity's sustainability-related financial disclosures and the data and assumptions used in preparing the related financial statements.
path_label: General Requirements For Disclosure Of Sustainabilityrelated Financial Information Abstract
a453d25a-2570-44be-b24e-ca55a7605724.enriched_definition: Differences between data and assumptions used in sustainability-related financial disclosures and related financial statements, requiring explanatory disclosure to highlight significant variations.

6ec81d0e-dab7-4d01-bc42-aa6664f744e1.prefLabel: Information About Transactions Other Events And Conditions That Occur After End Of Reporting Period But Before Date On Which Sustainabilityrelated Financial Disclosures Are Authorised For Issue Explanatory
6ec81d0e-dab7-4d01-bc42-aa6664f744e1.ifrs_definition: Disclosure of information about transactions, other events and conditions that occur after end of reporting period, but before date on which sustainability-related financial disclosures are authorised for issue.
path_label: General Requirements For Disclosure Of Sustainabilityrelated Financial Information Abstract
6ec81d0e-dab7-4d01-bc42-aa6664f744e1.enriched_definition: Transactions, events, or conditions occurring after the reporting period ends but before sustainability-related financial disclosures are issued, requiring explanatory disclosure.

519df9af-215b-4437-a68d-eaded4638c3f.prefLabel: Managements Role In Governance Processes Controls And Procedures Used To Monitor Manage And Oversee Risks And Opportunities Explanatory
519df9af-215b-4437-a68d-eaded4638c3f.ifrs_definition: The disclosure of management's role in the governance processes, controls and procedures used to monitor, manage and oversee sustainability-related risks and opportunities (including climate-related risks and opportunities), including information about: whether that role is delegated to a specific management-level position or management-level committee and how oversight is exercised over that position or committee; and whether management uses controls and procedures to support the oversight of sustainability-related risks and opportunities (including climate-related risks and opportunities) and, if so, how these controls and procedures are integrated with other internal functions.
path_label: Governance Processes Controls And Procedures Used To Monitor And Manage Climaterelated Risks And Opportunities Line Items
Governance Processes Controls And Procedures Used To Monitor And Manage Climaterelated Risks And Opportunities Abstract
519df9af-215b-4437-a68d-eaded4638c3f.enriched_definition: Management's role in governing sustainability and climate-related risks and opportunities, including delegated responsibilities, oversight mechanisms, and integrated controls and procedures to monitor and manage these risks.

b892a452-7d90-41fc-9c5c-706ff1f904b2.prefLabel: Method Used To Calculate Metric And Inputs To Calculation Including Limitations Of Method Used And Assumptions Made Explanatory
b892a452-7d90-41fc-9c5c-706ff1f904b2.ifrs_definition: The disclosure of the method used to calculate the metric and the inputs to the calculation, including the limitations of the method used and the significant assumptions made.
path_label: Metrics Developed By Entity Line Items
b892a452-7d90-41fc-9c5c-706ff1f904b2.enriched_definition: Description of calculation methodology and inputs for a specific metric, including limitations and significant assumptions made.

94adcd8f-532d-4ab5-a3d6-cd22553b3f9a.prefLabel: Methodology Used To Calculate Financed Emissions Explanatory
94adcd8f-532d-4ab5-a3d6-cd22553b3f9a.ifrs_definition: The disclosure of the methodology used to calculate the financed emissions, including the method of allocation the entity used to attribute its share of emissions in relation to the size of investments.
94adcd8f-532d-4ab5-a3d6-cd22553b3f9a.enriched_definition: Methodology used by financial institutions to calculate emissions from investments, including allocation methods to attribute emissions based on investment size.

75ae0cf2-5379-4c62-8f7e-c26d7d52c690.prefLabel: Metric Used To Set Target And To Monitor Progress Explanatory
75ae0cf2-5379-4c62-8f7e-c26d7d52c690.ifrs_definition: The disclosure of the sustainability-related metric(s) (including climate-related metrics) used to set the target and to monitor progress towards reaching the target.
75ae0cf2-5379-4c62-8f7e-c26d7d52c690.enriched_definition: Metric used to establish and track progress towards climate-related targets, including specific sustainability-related measurements.

e7e715e3-dad8-4526-817a-10f256d1fecf.enriched_definition: Metrics Developed By Entity Abstract refers to the specific, climate-related measurement tools and methodologies created by an organization to assess and report its environmental impact and progress towards sustainability goals.

dcfa2393-1d9f-44fe-a5fb-814b1eff642c.prefLabel: Metrics Developed By Entity Line Items
dcfa2393-1d9f-44fe-a5fb-814b1eff642c.ifrs_definition: Line items are the concepts grouped together in a table (because they may relate to several different facts within a report). These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with members defined in one or many axes of the table.
dcfa2393-1d9f-44fe-a5fb-814b1eff642c.enriched_definition: Specific data points in climate-related disclosures, represented as line items with string values, that provide detailed information on metrics developed by an entity, organized in tables to facilitate reporting and analysis.

2c4edc26-d795-4548-9898-a22c690b9fe0.ifrs_definition: Schedule disclosing sustainability-related metrics developed by the entity.
2c4edc26-d795-4548-9898-a22c690b9fe0.enriched_definition: Table listing sustainability metrics created by the entity, detailing climate-related disclosure data in a structured format.

fd983267-419d-4d87-854c-88dae3d9cb2d.ifrs_definition: The disclosure of any milestones and interim targets for sustainability-related metrics (including climate-related metrics).
fd983267-419d-4d87-854c-88dae3d9cb2d.enriched_definition: Specific goals and benchmarks set by an organization to track progress towards climate-related sustainability metrics, including intermediate achievements and key performance indicators.

365647e3-d7b9-41e8-b0da-14ecbb1484da.ifrs_definition: The disclosure of the objective of the climate-related target (for example, mitigation, adaptation or conformance with science-based initiatives).
365647e3-d7b9-41e8-b0da-14ecbb1484da.enriched_definition: Specific goal of a climate-related target, such as reducing emissions, adapting to climate change, or aligning with science-based initiatives.

76a73276-a832-4e91-a073-0af40dc4f012.prefLabel: Performance Against Target And Analysis Of Trends Or Changes In Performance Explanatory
76a73276-a832-4e91-a073-0af40dc4f012.ifrs_definition: The disclosure of entity's performance against the target and an analysis of trends or changes in the entity's performance.
76a73276-a832-4e91-a073-0af40dc4f012.enriched_definition: A text-based explanation of an entity's progress toward its climate-related targets, including analysis of performance trends and changes over time.

a1a0cb58-5830-4107-bb6d-4e369309b4f5.prefLabel: Planned Use Of Carbon Credits Abstract
a1a0cb58-5830-4107-bb6d-4e369309b4f5.enriched_definition: Planned utilization of carbon credits by an organization to offset emissions, reported in climate-related disclosures.

0c085b9b-e946-4595-908d-4f9d311f10aa.prefLabel: Planned Use Of Carbon Credits Line Items
0c085b9b-e946-4595-908d-4f9d311f10aa.ifrs_definition: Line items are the concepts grouped together in a table (because they may relate to several different facts within a report). These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with members defined in one or many axes of the table.
path_label: Planned Use Of Carbon Credits Abstract
0c085b9b-e946-4595-908d-4f9d311f10aa.enriched_definition: Specific line items in climate-related disclosures that detail the planned utilization of carbon credits, providing reportable information on how entities intend to use these credits to achieve their climate goals.

e1ca919d-2cb4-419c-ae85-9a2db04851b5.prefLabel: Planned Use Of Carbon Credits Table
e1ca919d-2cb4-419c-ae85-9a2db04851b5.ifrs_definition: Schedule disclosing the entity's planned use of carbon credits to offset greenhouse gas emissions to achieve any net greenhouse gas emissions target.
path_label: Planned Use Of Carbon Credits Abstract
e1ca919d-2cb4-419c-ae85-9a2db04851b5.enriched_definition: Table outlining an entity's intended utilization of carbon credits to offset greenhouse gas emissions and achieve net emissions targets.

43a8be0d-2a97-46be-87b9-a20534adc5c2.prefLabel: Processes And Related Policies To Identify Assess Prioritise And Monitor Risks Explanatory
43a8be0d-2a97-46be-87b9-a20534adc5c2.ifrs_definition: The disclosure of the processes and related policies the entity uses to identify, assess, prioritise and monitor sustainability-related risks (including climate-related risks).
path_label: Risk Management Of Climaterelated Risks And Opportunities Line Items
Risk Management Of Climaterelated Risks And Opportunities Abstract
43a8be0d-2a97-46be-87b9-a20534adc5c2.enriched_definition: Processes and policies used to identify, assess, prioritize, and monitor climate-related risks, enabling informed risk management and strategic decision-making.

63a7e0e6-268b-4e2e-aabd-e986a2e77775.prefLabel: Processes Used To Identify Assess Prioritise And Monitor Opportunities Explanatory
63a7e0e6-268b-4e2e-aabd-e986a2e77775.ifrs_definition: The disclosure of the processes the entity uses to identify, assess, prioritise and monitor sustainability-related opportunities (including climate-related opportunities).
path_label: Risk Management Of Climaterelated Risks And Opportunities Line Items
Risk Management Of Climaterelated Risks And Opportunities Abstract
63a7e0e6-268b-4e2e-aabd-e986a2e77775.enriched_definition: Processes used by an entity to identify, assess, prioritize, and monitor climate-related opportunities, including methods for evaluating and addressing sustainability-related chances.

360e81b7-f7c4-47de-82dc-b0643cb89866.prefLabel: Progress Against Plans Disclosed In Previous Reporting Periods Explanatory
360e81b7-f7c4-47de-82dc-b0643cb89866.ifrs_definition: The disclosure about the progress against plans the entity has disclosed in previous reporting periods, including quantitative and qualitative information.
path_label: Effects Of Climate Related Risks And Opportunities On Strategy And Decision Making Line Items
Effects Of Climate Related Risks And Opportunities On Strategy And Decision Making Abstract
360e81b7-f7c4-47de-82dc-b0643cb89866.enriched_definition: Progress against previously disclosed climate-related plans, including quantitative and qualitative updates on achievements and challenges.

159aaf50-8873-440f-99c6-9560bf031590.prefLabel: Reason For Using Reporting Period Longer Or Shorter Than12 Months Explanatory
159aaf50-8873-440f-99c6-9560bf031590.ifrs_definition: The disclosure of the reason for using a longer or shorter reporting period when an entity changes the end of its reporting period and discloses sustainability-related financial disclosures for a period longer or shorter than 12 months.
path_label: General Requirements For Disclosure Of Sustainabilityrelated Financial Information Abstract
159aaf50-8873-440f-99c6-9560bf031590.enriched_definition: Reason for using a reporting period that deviates from the standard 12-month duration, explaining why an entity has adopted a longer or shorter period for disclosing sustainability-related financial information.

72204c65-c473-453f-9971-e8b429b4b223.prefLabel: Reasons For Revising Comparative Amount Disclosed That Reflects New Information In Relation To Estimated Amount Disclosed In Preceding Period Explanatory
72204c65-c473-453f-9971-e8b429b4b223.ifrs_definition: The disclosure of the reasons the entity has disclosed a revised comparative amount that reflects new information in relation to the estimated amount disclosed in the preceding period, and the new information provides evidence of circumstances that existed in that period.
path_label: General Requirements For Disclosure Of Sustainabilityrelated Financial Information Abstract
72204c65-c473-453f-9971-e8b429b4b223.enriched_definition: Reasons for revising previously disclosed comparative amounts due to new information related to estimated amounts from preceding periods, highlighting circumstances that existed during that time.

90272a03-3331-4c25-91a2-f954c56ef55d.prefLabel: Redefinition Or Replacement Of Metrics Including Metrics Used To Set And Monitor Progress Towards Reaching Entitys Targets Abstract
90272a03-3331-4c25-91a2-f954c56ef55d.enriched_definition: Redefinition or replacement of climate-related metrics used to track progress towards entity's climate targets, including adjustments to existing metrics or introduction of new ones to accurately measure and monitor climate performance.

8a719e97-53a2-4c25-9d08-0a718c5ad2f3.prefLabel: Redefinition Or Replacement Of Metrics Including Metrics Used To Set And Monitor Progress Towards Reaching Entitys Targets Line Items
8a719e97-53a2-4c25-9d08-0a718c5ad2f3.ifrs_definition: Line items are the concepts grouped together in a table (because they may relate to several different facts within a report). These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with members defined in one or many axes of the table.
path_label: Redefinition Or Replacement Of Metrics Including Metrics Used To Set And Monitor Progress Towards Reaching Entitys Targets Abstract
8a719e97-53a2-4c25-9d08-0a718c5ad2f3.enriched_definition: Redefinition or replacement of metrics used to set and monitor progress towards reaching an entity's climate-related targets, including modifications to existing metrics or introduction of new ones to measure progress.

306e2775-5417-4da5-ade1-5ead60555535.prefLabel: Redefinition Or Replacement Of Metrics Including Metrics Used To Set And Monitor Progress Towards Reaching Entitys Targets Table
306e2775-5417-4da5-ade1-5ead60555535.ifrs_definition: Schedule disclosing the redefinition or replacement of metrics, including metrics used to set and monitor progress towards reaching entity's targets.
path_label: Redefinition Or Replacement Of Metrics Including Metrics Used To Set And Monitor Progress Towards Reaching Entitys Targets Abstract
306e2775-5417-4da5-ade1-5ead60555535.enriched_definition: A table detailing changes to metrics used to track progress towards the entity's climate-related targets, including redefinitions or replacements of existing metrics.

b58ceaad-b413-461c-999a-5c842fe52b1d.ifrs_definition: The disclosure of any revisions to the sustainability-related target (including climate-related targets) and an explanation for those revisions.
b58ceaad-b413-461c-999a-5c842fe52b1d.enriched_definition: Revisions To Target Explanatory refers to the disclosure of changes made to climate-related targets, including explanations for these revisions, providing transparency into adjustments to sustainability goals.

7cc5ca1d-e10a-4e1f-9f46-28d05457c927.prefLabel: Description Of Risk Or Opportunity Explanatory
7cc5ca1d-e10a-4e1f-9f46-28d05457c927.ifrs_definition: The description of a sustainability-related risk and or opportunity (including climate-related risk or opportunity) that could reasonably be expected to affect the entity's prospects.
path_label: Climaterelated Risks Or Opportunities Line Items
7cc5ca1d-e10a-4e1f-9f46-28d05457c927.enriched_definition: A text block explaining a specific sustainability-related risk or opportunity, including climate-related factors, that could impact the entity's future prospects.

61349a2f-3e9e-4222-b3b5-da685b7f09de.prefLabel: Risks And Opportunities With Significant Risk Of Material Adjustment Within Next Annual Reporting Period To Carrying Amounts Of Assets And Liabilities Explanatory
61349a2f-3e9e-4222-b3b5-da685b7f09de.ifrs_definition: The disclosure of sustainability-related risks and opportunities (that have affected the entity's financial position, financial performance and cash flows for the reporting period), including climate-related risks and opportunities, for which there is a significant risk of a material adjustment within the next annual reporting period to the carrying amounts of assets and liabilities reported in the related financial statements.
path_label: Current Financial Effects Of Climaterelated Risks And Opportunities Line Items
Current Financial Effects Of Climaterelated Risks And Opportunities Abstract
Financial Position Financial Performance And Cash Flows Abstract
61349a2f-3e9e-4222-b3b5-da685b7f09de.enriched_definition: Risks and opportunities with a significant risk of materially adjusting asset and liability values within the next annual reporting period, including climate-related impacts on financial position, performance, and cash flows.

edf39c69-dc95-4340-b369-32dc28d36f9f.enriched_definition: A concise description of an organization's climate-related strategy, outlining potential risks and opportunities associated with climate change, in a brief abstract format.

6071e7c7-a00a-4407-a339-14345a968a6b.ifrs_definition: Line items are the concepts grouped together in a table (because they may relate to several different facts within a report). These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with members defined in one or many axes of the table.
6071e7c7-a00a-4407-a339-14345a968a6b.enriched_definition: Specific concepts grouped in tables to disclose reportable climate-related information, relating to various facts and axes within a climate disclosure report.

75015697-8074-4718-a073-c735e5c9c9eb.ifrs_definition: Schedule disclosing information that enables users of general purpose financial reports to understand the sustainability-related risks and opportunities that could reasonably be expected to affect the entity's prospects.
75015697-8074-4718-a073-c735e5c9c9eb.enriched_definition: A table disclosing sustainability-related risks and opportunities that could impact the entity's prospects, enabling users to understand climate-related factors affecting financial reports.

43d7c750-9dd1-4629-a182-11a09b9d7fbc.prefLabel: Sources From Which Metric Was Drawn Explanatory
43d7c750-9dd1-4629-a182-11a09b9d7fbc.ifrs_definition: The disclosure of the sources, other than IFRS Sustainability Disclosure Standards, from which the entity drew a metric.
path_label: Source Of Metrics Other Than IFRS Standards Line Items
Source Of Metrics Other Than IFRS Standards Abstract
43d7c750-9dd1-4629-a182-11a09b9d7fbc.enriched_definition: Specific non-IFRS sources used to derive a particular metric, providing transparency into the origin of climate-related data.

e71f7d8e-1912-45bd-ae0d-c7791ac825d7.prefLabel: Sources Of Guidance Applied In Preparing Sustainabilityrelated Financial Disclosures Explanatory
e71f7d8e-1912-45bd-ae0d-c7791ac825d7.ifrs_definition: The disclosure of the specific standards, pronouncements, industry practice and other sources of guidance that the entity has applied in preparing its sustainability-related financial disclosures, including, if applicable, identifying the disclosure topics in the SASB Standards.
path_label: General Requirements For Disclosure Of Sustainabilityrelated Financial Information Abstract
e71f7d8e-1912-45bd-ae0d-c7791ac825d7.enriched_definition: Specific standards, pronouncements, and industry practices used to prepare sustainability-related financial disclosures, including relevant SASB Standards and disclosure topics.

4ca11614-8b95-4b58-b776-715885398300.prefLabel: Sources Of Measurement Uncertainty And Assumptions Approximations And Judgements Made In Measuring Amounts Subject To High Level Of Measurement Uncertainty Explanatory
4ca11614-8b95-4b58-b776-715885398300.ifrs_definition: The disclosure, in relation to disclosed amounts that are subject to a high level of measurement uncertainty, of the sources of: measurement uncertainty-for example, the dependence of the amount on the outcome of a future event, on a measurement technique or on the availability and quality of data from the entity's value chain; and the assumptions, approximations and judgements the entity has made in measuring the amount.
path_label: General Requirements For Disclosure Of Sustainabilityrelated Financial Information Abstract
4ca11614-8b95-4b58-b776-715885398300.enriched_definition: Sources of measurement uncertainty and assumptions for disclosed amounts with high uncertainty, including dependence on future events, measurement techniques, and data quality from the entity's value chain.

e92b1e0e-8100-40d5-ba23-fab2f7b1631d.enriched_definition: Targets Abstract refers to a high-level summary of climate-related objectives, outlining specific goals and ambitions in reducing greenhouse gas emissions or transitioning to a low-carbon economy, as disclosed by organizations in their climate reports.

22641613-d91c-4c95-ba29-7fbad1d2c70c.ifrs_definition: Line items are the concepts grouped together in a table (because they may relate to several different facts within a report). These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with members defined in one or many axes of the table.
22641613-d91c-4c95-ba29-7fbad1d2c70c.enriched_definition: Targets Line Items refer to specific concepts grouped in tables to disclose climate-related information, associating reportable data with defined members across multiple axes.

220356fb-c911-44bd-9137-50448a3fa1df.ifrs_definition: Schedule disclosing information about the targets the entity has set to monitor progress towards achieving its strategic goals and the targets it is required to meet by regulation or legislation.
220356fb-c911-44bd-9137-50448a3fa1df.enriched_definition: A table listing specific targets set by the entity to track progress towards strategic climate-related goals and regulatory requirements.

0a106eb6-72a4-453a-afd1-733c1f13109b.prefLabel: Time Horizons Over Which Effects Of Risk Or Opportunity Could Reasonably Be Expected To Occur Explanatory
0a106eb6-72a4-453a-afd1-733c1f13109b.ifrs_definition: The disclosure of the time horizons - short, medium or long over which the effects of sustainability-related risk or opportunity (including climate-related risk or opportunity) could reasonably be expected to affect the entity's prospects.
path_label: Climaterelated Risks Or Opportunities Line Items
0a106eb6-72a4-453a-afd1-733c1f13109b.enriched_definition: Time frames, categorized as short, medium, or long, during which climate-related risks or opportunities are expected to impact the entity's prospects and financial performance.

c9bda209-cb4f-476d-8a50-2dd2d1b868b4.prefLabel: Tradeoffs Between Risks And Opportunities Considered Explanatory
c9bda209-cb4f-476d-8a50-2dd2d1b868b4.ifrs_definition: The disclosure of trade-offs between sustainability-related risks and opportunities that the entity considered (for example, in making a decision on the location of new operations, an entity might have considered the environmental impacts of those operations and the employment opportunities they would create in a community).
path_label: Effects Of Risks And Opportunities On Strategy And Decisionmaking Line Items
Effects Of Risks And Opportunities On Strategy And Decisionmaking Abstract
c9bda209-cb4f-476d-8a50-2dd2d1b868b4.enriched_definition: Trade-offs between climate-related risks and opportunities considered by the entity, such as environmental impacts versus employment opportunities, when making strategic decisions like locating new operations.

5d4f220e-b87e-4f3f-b97f-bb5903780eb6.ifrs_definition: The disclosure of the type of carbon credit, including whether the underlying offset will be nature-based or based on technological carbon removals and whether the offset is achieved through carbon removal or emission avoidance.
path_label: Planned Use Of Carbon Credits Explanatory
Planned Use Of Carbon Credits Line Items
Planned Use Of Carbon Credits Abstract
5d4f220e-b87e-4f3f-b97f-bb5903780eb6.enriched_definition: Type of carbon credit, specifying whether it's nature-based, technologically removed, or achieved through removal or emission avoidance.

db2269f0-9755-4527-8b4c-c1ebf9a5b596.prefLabel: Type Of Material Information Not Disclosed Due To Prohibition Of Disclosure And Explanation Of Source Of Restriction Explanatory
db2269f0-9755-4527-8b4c-c1ebf9a5b596.ifrs_definition: The disclosure of the type of material information not disclosed because law or regulation prohibits the entity from disclosing that information, and an explanation of the source of the restriction.
path_label: General Requirements For Disclosure Of Sustainabilityrelated Financial Information Abstract
db2269f0-9755-4527-8b4c-c1ebf9a5b596.enriched_definition: Information about material matters that cannot be disclosed due to legal or regulatory restrictions, along with explanations for the source of these restrictions.

01f2729a-bf9a-4e7f-8f07-2050ada4f5f9.prefLabel: Verification Or Certification Schemes To Which Carbon Credit Will Be Subject Explanatory
01f2729a-bf9a-4e7f-8f07-2050ada4f5f9.ifrs_definition: The disclosure of verification or certification scheme(s) to which carbon credit will be subject.
path_label: Planned Use Of Carbon Credits Explanatory
Planned Use Of Carbon Credits Line Items
Planned Use Of Carbon Credits Abstract
01f2729a-bf9a-4e7f-8f07-2050ada4f5f9.enriched_definition: Specific verification or certification schemes that carbon credits are required to undergo, ensuring their legitimacy and environmental integrity.

40dab22f-e9a4-4964-bec7-ef9c7164ad0c.prefLabel: Whether And How Processes To Identify Assess Prioritise And Monitor Risks For Riskmanagement Purposes Changed Compared With Previous Reporting Period Explanatory
40dab22f-e9a4-4964-bec7-ef9c7164ad0c.ifrs_definition: The disclosure of whether and how the entity has changed the processes it uses to identify, assess, prioritise and monitor sustainability-related risks (including climate-related risks) for risk-management purposes compared with the previous reporting period.
path_label: Processes And Related Policies To Identify Assess Prioritise And Monitor Risks Explanatory
Risk Management Of Climaterelated Risks And Opportunities Line Items
Risk Management Of Climaterelated Risks And Opportunities Abstract
40dab22f-e9a4-4964-bec7-ef9c7164ad0c.enriched_definition: Changes to processes for identifying, assessing, prioritizing, and monitoring sustainability-related and climate-related risks for risk management, compared to the previous reporting period.

99261da7-3f39-4fb1-84dc-5a044a49fb38.ifrs_definition: The disclosure of whether and how the entity uses climate-related scenario analysis to inform its identification of climate-related opportunities.
